review_text: Not sure what the fuss is about, I ve been here over 3 times and I always see the same chef there cooking and I know he s all about the art of the burger. Every time I dined here I ve thought,  Man it s the best burger I ve ever had.  But it continues every visit! Def an underrated spot
Really tasty smash burgers and super duper nice service!!
Amazing service . The cook came out of the restaurant and handed me my order as I was still parked in the car . Above and beyond .Highly recommend.

Excellent service, best hamburgers done to perfection and exactly as ordered,  friendly attendant and cooker, they bring the food to the table, great location,  well kept restaurant, good crowd, well recommended.
The burger was great. Even better the gentleman running the place was friendly and professional. Have not been there in many years but will definitely go back again soon.

Friendly place and good burgers. The people working there were nice and the seats inside were comfy. What appeals to me the most is their wide selection of burgers. I tried the stinger which has jalapenos in it and gives it a spicy zing to it. Ill come again to try the other special burgers they have.
My hamburger was very nice and  juice,  so happy that I didnt wait in line also was very quiet,  cashier and cook polite and friendly they worked so nice as a team keep it up guys

My Buddy and I went to Veras last Friday night  and ordered 2 Vera combos,  one double and one single. Best burger Ive had in a very long time. The meat was well seasoned and juicy.  Overall, my buddy gave the double cheese burger 10/10. I also give the burger 10/10. The combo comes with fries and eating in a bottomless soda. Large selection of sodas to choose from.  The fries were nothing special,  but the Burger was fantastic.  Will return when the opportunity presents. Cheers!
The food is actually really good, we order a burguers and poutine and the poutine was a really good portion. The attention of the crew was amazing. Food

THE BEST burger in town...hands down! Its our go-to whenever we are craving a good burger. We usually get the original Vera burger and we were never disappointed. Staff at the Main st location are kind and professional and service is quick! Highly recommend this place!
Great burgers!!! Staff is friendly, service is fast, food is fresh, price is good. (Im not crazy about their fries - slightly overpriced).
Taste of burger is amazing and place is not very good but the taste of food is prepared you for good experience.

Ordered for takeout the bacon, mushroom cheese burger with sweet potato fries - delish! Loved how it was still hot when we arrived at our destination.  Also, saw how cool and professional the staff was dealing with a difficult customer. We appreciate your service! Recommend this place.
These burgers are amazing I really also enjoy the service here as you don t get that at most places these days Thanks
I got Classic burger and onion rings from here and it was awsome ! The burger was super tasty and fresh. Highly recommend.
By far, the best burgers on Main St. Service is awesome and they always make you feel welcome.
Best burger and fries in Vancouver hands down! Plus staff are great! Will always come back!

Super friendly staff, and even better tasting food! Always made fresh to order and will definitely be back to this place. Highly recommended! Especially the Stinger Burger, if you have a taste for some spicy heat ;))
I just loved it! Really tasty burger, really great service, am I missing something? Oh yes, a fair price! Very polite service, you guys check all the boxes. Next time Ill take pictures.
omg no! Best burgers....mmmmm
Definitely come back. Buffalo chicken burger was very good.
Love it when you can customize the burger with a multitude of toppings and sauces!

Stopped in here for quick lunch during a work trip, and was greeted almost immediately as I walked in the door. Super friendly staff! I tried their Buffalo Chicken Burger and absolutely loved it. Perfect fry on the chicken, flavourful buffalo sauce, and a very tasty bun. Was a little expensive, but well worth the quality of the food. Highly recommend this place!
Ive never been big on Veras burgers, but for some reason this location does em best. Also the manager is a legit pillar of the main st community. Good times are to be had here.
My partner and I tried Veras for the first time the other day and really enjoyed our burgers and fries. Also the owner was working and is really nice. We will for sure go back.

The best service on main street! The guys here were so friendly and kind. Even thought it was only counter service, they made the experience memorable. Would definitely eat here again! A refreshing change from all the restaurants that forget you re even sitting there

The burgers are solid, pretty typical Veras fair. The owner is one of those people who instantly remembers faces and is really kind/attentive. Highly recommend due to just how great he and the rest of the staff have been over the last 5 years.

Come here almost every Friday, finding a table is sometimes a little difficult in larger parties. Friendly staff, owner recognizes us. Extremely quick service. In my opinion, best burger in Vancouver. Overall a great place
Great food. Friendly staff. You feel like family here
Awesome burger! Very friendly staff and a nice little spot. The burger really was amazing though, think I finished in 5 minutes, it was so good.
Great staff and food! Thanks guys!!
Legend burger legend owner perfect atmosphere!!!

I dont know if its because I really havent had a burger in a restaurant (only takeout) since the pandemic started, but this was phenomenal.  The beef was hot and well seasoned and Veras sauce was tasty.  I enjoyed the jalapeno bottle caps.  Ill definitely be coming back.
Great burgers! I had the classic bacon cheeseburger and my wife one with fried mushrooms. Juicy and very well seasoned. The staff is friendly. Definitely I ll go back there.
Great burger joint. Lovely people.
Great service, delicious burgers
I love this place. The staff is super friendly and the food comes out really quickly. Its my go to burger joint when I am in the area.
If you want a burger, this is the place to go. High quality ingredients for a high quality taste. 100% worth the try
Good burgers decent price

I get that Veras is not for everyone, but Im still convinced its the best burger in Vancouver.  Ive had Milestones, Five Guys, and a dozen independent places, and I still havent found one that does it better than Veras.  The Canola Oil fries are also pretty cool.

Absolutely the BEST Burger shack in town HANDS DOWN! Wow this place delivers on quality everytime! Great customer service even thought they dont come past the counter much! Canuck Burger is my new favorite!
The staff gave us great service, were very patient and were able to make sure my wife and I got exactly what we wanted. Food was good and portions were generous. Great lunch!
Went here everyday while my boyfriend was recovering from surgery! Lovely staff and really great chicken strips!
Clean friendly environment. Great burger and big portions of fries. My girlfriend had the poutine and veggie burger and both were a hit. Ill be back regularly. A+
The staff here are very friendly and the burgers are awesome. Get the lamb burger! All of the usual toppings are free and they have lots of extras for a little more. Fries are also extra
Veras Burger Shack make delicious burgers that are always the perfect dinner treat. Great staff too Sadly no photo as it was consumed with gusto
Best burger I had in a long time! Better Poutine than the Quebec joint down the street, hockey game was on, reasonable prices & friendly staff. You crave a burger, look no further.
Amazing place. Staff are super friendly and definitely care about your meal and experience. Much more then just a place to grab a GREAT BURGER!

Best burgers in town    never been disappointed for the past 10 years Anthony knows what it takes to get the burgers right once you try it you would understand the art of getting it right and toping it of with excellent service
Great ambience and amazing food. Friendly staff and quick service. If you re a foodie a must visit in Downtown
Very good burguer.
My favourite place to devour a burger. No where else I rather go and their point system is amazing. Be sure to enjoy abgreat burger here!! Veras meat is incredible!!
A great vibe, charismatic staff, and I can honestly say I felt the food quality was 10/10. I dont feel like Im getting ripped off, they just seem to genuinely care about their food.
Best chain burger place in town. Love their juicy and fresh home-made patties. Keep up great job Veras.
Best burger Ive ever had! The price is fair and the Staff is awesome :) First place in mind when talking about burgers in Vancouver !
My favourite burger place in town. Yummy burgers and super nice staff.
Best burger weve had for ages.Seriously good.Succulent and super tasty and the staff were really friendly.

Anthony has exceptional customer service and amazing scale preparing the food it is always fresh and fast with proper amount of toping Ill having been eating at Veras burger on Main Street with out of dowght  its one of best in Vancouver
It is my first time her and I must say  delicious burger, friendly staff .. everything is great, I am coming back for sure.
One of the best burgers i ever ate in life. The place is super humble... but not the burger. I suggest The Double Veras.
The burgers and the the people are awesome the food is great and the people are awesome to talk to I would say everyone should come here to eat
We had quick lunch with kids yesterday. Food was really good even for my fussy eater (5 years old). Thank you
Love the place. Great milkshakes l. Soul food. Great price and management. Very friendly.
Ive been here 5 or 6 times and had the Canadian Burger and a beer every time.  Great buy for the price.
Went to the Main St. Location, friendly service. Defiantly a good spot to catch a sports game!
The best Vera burger in town. G money is the mahhney. Amazing staff! Anthony and  T. Are the best
Awesome burgers, and very friendly staff make for a great food joint.  Check these guys out.
Anthony is the best I try lot of Burgers in the area, this one is my favorite by far 100% satisfaction highly recommended
Great charbroiled burgers. Fries are solid. Wide variety of toppings and special burgers. Fried onions are free!
Best burgers yet. Owners goes out of his way for us. Friendly staff.
Amazing food, staff, and atmosphere. 10/10 would recommend this location.
The food is great, the staff are amazing!! Such a good place to grab a quick bite!!
Was in here last night and the food was very enjoyable. Will definately be back here again
Devon runs an amazing team 10/5 would go back again.
Great #burger and #yummy! We came with the Team after our #businessmeeting, and the service was espectacular
These guys kill it with their burgers. One of the best burgers ive had in the city for the price.
Best burgers in town
Great burger joint in Vancouvers mt pleasant. Great staff and good burgers.
Literally best burgers Ive had. Fresh and tasty.
Great service, very friendly. Good food.  Had a philly cheeseteak which was delicious.
Best veggie burger in town, particularly at this location. Great service as well
I love the burgers here they are really good.
Great burgers! Amazing staff
Great service very kind safe place to eat...I Will be returning
The burger was good and the staff very friendly
Delicious burgers. Crispy fries. Games always on. Beer s always cold.
Best service and delicious food It was so filling G-money is
Honestly, really friendly staff. Good juicy burgers.
Delicious burger and great customer service....
The fries are totally awesome and the burgers are as good as homemade.
Outstanding. Best burger on Main,  in a city known for burgers. Staff friendly.
Delicious burgers and super friendly staff
Great atmosphere really good service. The food was amazing.
wow awesome burger shack...great service, fast, and fresh. 10/10
Ordered their lamb burger & a pint of pale ale..life is good
One of the best damn burgers in Vancouver!
Excellent natural burger.  Wrapped in lettuce for a fresh experience
I enjoyed my veggie burger .... great staff
Delicious burgers. Anthony is a really good dude. A staple of vancouver
I LOVE VERAS one of my favourite burger places to go
